com.tsgrp.migration.transformation

Class IfWithEvalRepeatingTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.transformation.AbstractTransformer
      • com.tsgrp.migration.transformation.IfWithEvalRepeatingTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingSource

    public class IfWithEvalRepeatingTransformer
extends AbstractTransformer
    IfWithArrayEval Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") allows for a general IF checker and allows the ability to do checks against migration node attributes which return an array of values and static values. If using attributes on node then pass it in with an ! appended to the left of it as shown in the example below. If using a static value then do not use the ! symbol.

    For example, attr value, documentType,is being checked against another migration node documentType or static value like "Correspondence" Then options for whether the values match or don't match can be supplied. @{IfWithEvalRepeating~!documentType~Correspondence~TRUTH~FALLACY} Document type returns multiple values since it is a repeating attribute. If Correspondence is equal to any of the values returned by documentType of the migration node the value resolves to "TRUTH", else if not true resolves to "FALLACY"
